entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
